data.title: Favourites Section
data.content: You can now add your favourite features & get easy access to those.

data.title: View History
data.content: Enhanced filters to view your history conversions

data.title: Excel to PDF
data.content: You can now convert your excel files to PDF too!

data.title: Zip to PDF
data.content: You can now convert your images zip files to PDF too!

84.title: Invert PDF
84.content: New feature to invert PDF colors

84.title: Split PDF
84.content: Added More ways to split PDF

83.title: Remove duplicate pages
83.content: New feature: remove duplicate pages from PDF.

80.title: Reorder PDF pages
80.content: Fixed errors in Reorder and Remove PDF pages.

79.title: Rearrange images while creating PDF
79.content: Now, you can easily sort images while creating PDF using images

74.title: Merge PDF
74.content: Easily select multiple PDF at once to merge

74.title: Access doc & docx files
74.content: Now, you can convert doc & docx files also to PDF

72.title: Add watermark
72.content: Now add watermark to PDFs while creating, or on created PDFs

72.title: Adding or removing password made easy
72.content: Now, easily add or remove password from the navigation drawer on left

72.title: Set master password yourself
72.content: Go to settings -> you can change master password too :)
